thread.section_title: Rome Life Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Conveniently located
thread.title_full: Conveniently located - Review of Rome Life Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: superflydmw
title: Conveniently located
text:
This is part of the Moods Hotels chain, so you can look for Rome (????) Hotels for other options as they are quite similar.
The hotel is decent, friendly staff, good breakfast, room is sufficiently large for the classic size. Bar and coffee table items are all free to use.
Do approach the desk if you need stuff. They are quite helpful. I would recommend this hotel to others. It's a walk away from all the sightseeing locations in Rome, and food places too.
